graph.original_query: The code in the files is for a tic-tac-toe game, its not working, fix the issue in the same files. No other changes, just make it work

file_profiles.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to analyze three files: an HTML file (index.html), a JavaScript file (script.js), and a CSS file (style.css). I'll generate a file profile for each, including the file type, a summary of the content, key elements, and an assessment of the file's purpose and quality.

analysis.content_summary: HTML file for a Tic Tac Toe game. Contains the structure for the game board, score board and associated elements.
analysis.sample_content: <div id="game-board" class="grid grid-cols-3 gap-4 w-80 mx-auto">
analysis.inferred_purpose: Front-end structure for a Tic Tac Toe game.

file_profiles.summary: HTML file defines the structure of Tic Tac Toe game's user interface including the game board, score display and reset button.

analysis.content_summary: JavaScript file containing the logic for a Tic Tac Toe game. Manages the game board, player turns, win conditions, and score updates.
analysis.inferred_purpose: Game logic and interactivity for a Tic Tac Toe game.

file_profiles.summary: JavaScript file implements the core functionality of the Tic Tac Toe game, including move handling, win checking, and score management.

analysis.content_summary: CSS stylesheet defines the visual style of a Tic Tac Toe game including fonts, colors, layout and responsiveness.
analysis.inferred_purpose: Visual styling for the Tic Tac Toe game.

file_profiles.summary: CSS file provides styling and layout for the Tic Tac Toe game utilizing Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Analyze the HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files and fix the tic-tac-toe game logic in the JavaScript file.
nodes.agent_prompt:
You are provided with the HTML (index.html), CSS (style.css), and JavaScript (script.js) files for a tic-tac-toe game. The game is not working as expected. Analyze the code, identify the errors in the javascript file (script.js) and fix the game logic. Ensure the fix is compatible with the existing HTML and CSS. Output the corrected javascript code. Do not change the HTML or CSS, only focus on fixing the javascript. Do not make any other change other than fixing the bugs. The current versions of files are:

index.html:
```html
[contents of index.html]
```

style.css:
```css
[contents of style.css]
```

script.js:
```javascript
[contents of script.js]
```

nodes.agent_prompt: Summarize the changes made to the javascript file to fix the tic-tac-toe game, highlighting the specific logic that was corrected and the impact of those corrections on the game's functionality.
